title: Eyewitness
creator_credit: Bill Butt, Oregon Public Broadcasting, Dorling Kindersley Vision, Wildvision and BBC-TV
brief_description: Eyewitness presents the ultimate Natural History experience as the viewer experiences a dazzling wildlife tour interweaving fact, history, anecdote, myth and legend.
